channel.title: Survival X - Hardcore Deadman & Zombie Survival
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/x1vV6sP.png[/img]
Deadman inspired Hardcore Survival with worldwide PvP.
We are proud to announce the release of our [B]Open Beta[/B].
[SPOILER=Features] [LEFT] [ul][*]Perk System & Perk Tree [*]Object Claming System for Player Owned Bases [*]Day & Night System [*]Environment Gathering System [*]Intuitive Item Crafting System [*]Worldwide Random Events such as Supply Drops, Bandit Raids, & more [*]& Much, much more.[/ul] [/LEFT] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Media] [img]http://i.imgur.com/E0Gdz1a.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2Tu7yHq.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://bit.ly/survivalx"]Play Now[/URL] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Video]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-8KtHv92A0Q [/SPOILER]
[URL=http://"http://bit.ly/survivalx"]Play Now[/URL]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/i9ig2mJ.jpg[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: Survival X - Hardcore Deadman & Zombie Survival
item.dc:creator: @CleanCut CleanCut
item.description:
@CleanCut wrote:

[quote=“Danjam89b, post:5, topic:554567”][quote author=CleanCut link=topic=673490.msg4503663#msg4503663 date=1454466066]
To answer the how to play question, click Play Now in the thread!

Other than that thanks for the feedback!
[/quote]

That was really hard to notice. It does not stand out at all.[/quote]

Oh sorry!

Read full topic
